topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e29a336368722ef8450500#post_54e29a336368722ef8450500
Chronologically, The 08th MS team happened in the middle of 0079. Starting shortly before [spoiler]Ghiren's speech after Garma's death.[/spoiler] (It was made in 1995, While 0079 was made in 1979) War in the pocket took place near the end of 0079 and was made in 1989. Then there's 1991's 0083 stardust memory. Then the first official sequel to Gundam, "Zeta Gundam" (Which takes place in 0087) Was made in 1985.
